name: Stars Below
description:
A short bitsy game by Sarah Gould, made for the Midnight Jam. Use the arrow keys or swiping gestures to move your avatar.

Music by Kai Engel: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Kai_Engel/Better_Way/Kai_Engel_-_Better_Way_-_...

Bitsy by Adam LeDoux: http://ledoux.io/bitsy/editor.html
